localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Slite, the collaborative workspace for your team's documents, notes, wiki just got a bit better by letting you draw and sketch right into it ✨🧑‍🎨 We did so by integrating with Excalidraw, one of the best open source sketching tool out there.
blogPost.body: Slite, the collaborative workspace for your team's documents, notes, wiki just got a bit better by letting you draw and sketch right into it ✨🧑‍🎨 We did so by integrating with Excalidraw, one of the best open source sketching tool out there.
blogPost.title: Slite + Excalidraw - Add sketches to all your docs, wiki, notes and projects
blogPost.author: Christophe Pasquier

localize.description: Slite，你的团队文档、笔记、wiki的协作工作空间刚刚变得更好了，让你可以直接在里面画画和画草图✨🧑🎨我们是通过整合Excalidraw来实现的，Excalidraw是最好的开源草图工具之一。
localize.tagline: 将草图添加到你所有的文档、维基、笔记和项目中。

localize.description: Slite，你的團隊文檔、筆記、wiki的協作工作空間剛剛變得更好了，讓你可以直接在裏面畫畫和畫草圖✨🧑🎨我們是通過整合Excalidraw來實現的，Excalidraw是最好的開源草圖工具之一。
localize.tagline: 將草圖添加到你所有的文檔、維基、筆記和項目中。

previous.excerpt: WebAutomation.io is the largest marketplace to find ready-made no code web scrapers. With only a few clicks and a few seconds you can start extracting data from your favourite site without coding or building from scratch.
previous.title: WebAutomation.io - The biggest marketplace of readymade no code web scrapers

localize.description: WebAutomation.io是最大的市场，可以找到现成的没有代码的网络刮刀。只需点击几下，几秒钟，您就可以开始从您最喜欢的网站提取数据，而无需编码或从头开始构建。
localize.tagline: 最大的现成的无代码网络搜刮器市场。

localize.description: WebAutomation.io是最大的市場，可以找到現成的沒有代碼的網絡刮刀。只需點擊幾下，幾秒鐘，您就可以開始從您最喜歡的網站提取數據，而無需編碼或從頭開始構建。
localize.tagline: 最大的現成的無代碼網絡搜刮器市場。
